data.expected_result: The second message should appear in red exactly like the first one
data.short_description: Sometimes when a message fails to send, it disappears completely instead of showing in red
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a DM with a user who blocked you - Attempt to send a message. It should show in red asking you if you want to resend - Don't touch that message, and try to send a second one
